Flow.description: Screen flow for users with access to automate subscription plan changes for MC firms

formulas.name: f_CurrentProductTier

Flow.interviewLabel: Billing Subscription: Change Firm Billing Plan {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Billing Subscription: Change Firm Billing Plan

fields.name: flowIntructionsDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Zuora Actions: Change a customer's billing plan or re-charge a payment method using the buttons below.


You have access to do the following:

value.stringValue: [{"label":"Change Billing Plan","value":"Change Billing Plan","iconPosition":"left","variant":"neutral","iconName":"utility:record_update","index":0},{"label":"Charge Payment Method","value":"Charge Payment Method","iconPosition":"left","variant":"neutral","iconName":"utility:moneybag","index":1}]

fields.name: change_plan_instructions
fields.fieldText: Search for the customer's active subscription by entering the Firm ID and clicking Next.

fields.name: chargePaymentInstructions
fields.fieldText: Enter the Firm ID of the customer to charge.

fields.name: chargeConfirmationDisplay
fields.fieldText: See Account details below and click Charge to process payment or Cancel to exit.

fields.name: newSelectionDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Select the new Tier and Billing Cycle the firm would like to subscribe to.


A Tier downgrade and/or switching from Annual to Monthly will take effect on the firm's next billing date: {!f_NextBillingDate}.

fields.name: confirmationDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
See below to confirm changes to the firm's MyCase subscription. Click Confirm to process or Cancel to exit to start over.


A slack message will be sent when changes are successfully processed.

fields.name: noAccessAlert
fields.fieldText: You do not have the required permissions to execute the selected action

fields.name: noBA_display
fields.fieldText: No Billing Account matching Firm ID: {!Firm_ID} found with an Account Balance to charge

fields.name: noCharge_display
fields.fieldText: An error occurred. Please try again.
